titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the execution of the lawes against recusants.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall the sixteenth day of February, in the second yeere of our reigne ..
Imprint from colophon; the years are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 12; Steele notation: Commons such 2) of may.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
